item.title: 麦格理称第三季度黄金或涨至 3,500 美元
item.description: 麦格理集团（Macquarie Group）的分析师认为，黄金的避险魅力不断增强，可能会使其在第三季度飙升至每盎司 3500 美元的历史新高。【原文：Gold’s burgeoning safe-haven allure may see it surge to a record high of $3,500 an ounce during the third quarter, according to Macquarie Group analysts.】

item.title: 阿里巴巴推出人工智能代理应用，力争赶超竞争对手
item.description: 阿里巴巴集团控股有限公司（Alibaba Group Holding Ltd.）发布了新版人工智能助手移动应用程序，其中纳入了最新的内部模型，这是该公司推出的一系列产品中的又一款，旨在帮助公司跟上中国人工智能竞争对手的步伐。【原文：Alibaba Group Holding Ltd. unveiled a new version of its AI assistant mobile app that incorporates its latest in-house model, another in a series of product rollouts intended to help the company keep pace with Chinese artificial intelligence rivals.】

item.title: 外资抢购中国银行债务或将提升人民币防卫能力
item.description: 中国的债券抛售为外国投资者创造了机会，他们可以用美元换取更具吸引力的人民币短期银行债务，并在无意中加强了中国政府对本国货币的支持。【原文：China’s bond selloff is creating pockets of opportunity for foreign investors, who can swap dollars for more attractive yuan-denominated short-term bank debt — and inadvertently bolster Beijing’s support of its currency.】

item.title: 直播：英国富时 100 指数将跑赢大盘，因股市情绪低迷
兰特拖累收入，标准银行利润增长放缓
item.description: 标准银行集团（Standard Bank Group Ltd.）的利润增速是 2020 年以来最慢的，因为这家非洲大陆资产规模最大的贷款机构感受到了兰特汇率走强对其在非洲大陆 20 项业务表现的影响。【原文：Standard Bank Group Ltd.’s profit grew at the slowest pace since 2020 as the continent’s biggest lender by assets felt the impact of a strong rand on the performance of its 20 businesses across the continent.】

item.title: 高盛称对冲基金转向解除亚洲头寸
item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc）周三在给客户的一份说明中说，对冲基金继上周五在美国和欧洲抛出赌注后，周一又在亚洲解除了看涨和看跌的赌注。【原文：Hedge funds moved to unwind bullish and bearish wagers in Asia on Monday, after dumping bets in the US and Europe on Friday, Goldman Sachs Group Inc. said in a note to clients on Wednesday.】

item.title: 韩国立法者允许股票发生 "约 60 年来最大的变化
item.description: 韩国立法者投票决定扩大公司董事会的信托责任标准，这一具有里程碑意义的举措可能会促使主导市场的大型家族控制企业发生变革。【原文：South Korean lawmakers voted to expand corporate boards’ fiduciary duty standard, a landmark move that may spur changes at large family-controlled businesses that dominate the market.】

item.title: 香港通过指数人寿保险规则吸引富人
item.description: 香港当局放宽了规定，允许高净值人士使用一种在新加坡和美国越来越受欢迎的保险产品。【原文：Hong Kong authorities relaxed rules to allow high net worth individuals to access an insurance product that has been gaining traction in Singapore and the US.】

item.title: 中国为何难以摆脱通货紧缩周期
item.description: 事实证明，中国陷入通货紧缩的漩涡难以收拾。这个世界第二大经济体的总体物价已连续两年下跌，如果到2025年物价再次下跌，正如许多分析家预测的那样，这将是中国自20世纪60年代以来持续时间最长的一次通货紧缩。【原文：China’s spiral into deflation is proving hard to fix. Overall prices in the world’s second-largest economy have fallen for two straight years, and if they drop again in 2025 — as many analysts are predicting — it would mark the longest deflationary streak for the country since the 1960s.】

item.title: 中投公司（CIC）老员工在建立价值 1000 亿美元的交易平台后退休
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，曾帮助中国投资有限责任公司（China Investment Corp.）发展成为全球市场年交易额达 1,000 亿美元的巨头的丹尼尔-丁（Daniel Ding）在离开中国主权财富基金 14 年后已经卸任。【原文：Daniel Ding, who helped build China Investment Corp. into a $100 billion-a-year trading giant in global markets, has stepped down from the Chinese sovereign wealth fund after 14 years, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 数据中心运营商 Firmus 寻求 1.2 亿美元私人贷款
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，澳大利亚数据中心公司 Firmus Technologies 的新加坡运营实体正在寻求 1.2 亿美元的私人贷款，以资助其资本支出。【原文：A Singapore operating entity of Australian data center firm Firmus Technologies is seeking a $120 million private loan to fund its capital expenditure, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 越南调查描绘中国在争议海域主权主张的儿童玩具
item.description: 越南正在加强对特定儿童玩具的检查，因为人们担心玩具模型上的图案与中国用来证明其在南中国海的领土要求的地图相似。【原文：Vietnam is stepping up inspections of particular children’s toys over concerns that imagery on the model’s face resembles a map China uses to stake competing territorial claims in the South China Sea.】

item.title: 趁现在享受通胀好消息
item.description:
关税的不确定性仍将使美联储不愿降息。【原文：

Uncertainty over tariffs will still leave the Fed reluctant to cut rates.

】

item.title: 印度最大银行将成立人工智能和金融科技项目融资部门
item.description: 据一位高级管理人员透露，印度最大的贷款机构印度国家银行正在成立一个部门，负责管理人工智能、电子商务和金融科技等 "新时代产业 "的项目融资解决方案。【原文：State Bank of India, the country’s largest lender, is setting up a unit to manage project financing solutions for “new age industries” such as artificial intelligence, e-commerce, and fintech, according to a senior executive.】

item.title: 竞标战蔓延，曼哈顿公寓租金跃升至创纪录水平
item.description: 在激烈的竞争中，曼哈顿的公寓租金在 2 月份飙升至历史新高，其中超过四分之一的交易出现了竞标战。【原文：Manhattan apartment rents soared to a record high in February amid intense competition, including bidding wars in a more than a quarter of all deals.】

item.title: 纽约人口反弹面临特朗普移民计划的考验
item.description: 根据人口普查局的估计，纽约市的人口正在重新增长，这是在大流行病早期损失最大的许多地区出现的广泛反弹的一部分。【原文：New York City’s population is growing again, according to Census Bureau estimates, part of a broader rebound in many areas that saw the largest losses in the pandemic’s early years.】

item.title: 新加坡服务器欺诈案嫌犯获保释，调查仍在继续
item.description: 新加坡一名法官批准三名男子保释，他们涉嫌欺骗服务器计算机供应商，这些计算机可能含有受美国出口限制的 Nvidia 公司芯片。【原文：A Singapore judge granted bail for the three men suspected of defrauding suppliers of server computers potentially containing Nvidia Corp. chips subject to US export curbs.】

item.title: 泰国酒店业者计划向美国扩张，借白莲花热潮套现
item.description: Minor International Pcl 公司在泰国的酒店在热播剧《白莲花》中有精彩表演，该公司计划在美国拓展业务，以利用新发现的全球声誉，自上个月该剧开播以来，客房预订量急剧上升。【原文：Minor International Pcl, whose hotels in Thailand feature in the hit series White Lotus, plans to expand in the US to cash in on the newfound global fame that’s seen room bookings skyrocket since the show began airing last month.】

item.title: 花旗集团称，关税加征前铜价可达到 10,000 美元
item.description: 花旗集团（Citigroup Inc）称，未来三个月铜价将达到每吨 10,000 美元。【原文：Copper will hit $10,000 a ton in the coming three months, according to Citigroup Inc., which said the global market will remain tight until the timeline for US import tariffs becomes clearer.】

item.title: 摩根大通称美国股市调整的最坏时期可能已经过去
item.description: 摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：The worst of the US equity correction may be over, with credit markets indicating a lower risk of recession, according to JPMorgan Chase & Co.】

item.title: 中俄关键石油贸易重回正轨，制裁冲击减弱
item.description: 由于托运人和中间商为帮助缓解美国制裁的影响而寻找变通办法，俄罗斯ESPO原油的价格有所降温，中国买家重回市场。【原文：Chinese buyers are back in the market for Russia’s ESPO crude, thanks to prices that have cooled as shippers and middlemen find workarounds to help blunt the impact of US sanctions.】

item.title: 泰国最大的肉类生产商将加快境外子公司的首次公开募股进程
item.description: 泰国最大的肉类生产商 Charoen Pokphand Foods Pcl 将加快其最大的海外业务部门的首次公开募股和上市进程，以便为扩张提供资金。【原文：Thailand’s largest meat producer Charoen Pokphand Foods Pcl will accelerate the initial public offering and listing of its biggest offshore unit to fund expansion.】

item.title: 特朗普的 1.4 万亿美元关税威胁促使企业寻求庇护
item.description: Ozempic生产商诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）正计划在越南生产更多供应美国市场的药品；波音公司（Boeing Co.【原文：Ozempic-maker Novo Nordisk A/S is planning to make more of its medicines for the US market in the country; Boeing Co. risks a gummed up supply chain and higher aircraft costs it may not be able to pass on; Chinese online retailer Shein Group Ltd. is offering incentives to its top apparel providers to set up new production capacity in Vietnam.】

item.title: 原油价格下跌，降息希望可能让印度股市重回正轨
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: 台湾警告股票外流和特朗普政策带来的货币风险
item.description: 台湾央行去年为保护本国货币花费了创纪录的巨额资金，鉴于股市外流加剧和贸易紧张局势升级，台湾央行可能需要采取更多措施。【原文：Taiwan’s central bank spent a record amount of money defending its currency last year and may need to do more, given worsening stock market outflows and escalating trade tensions.】

item.title: 韩国 DN Solutions 据称将在首尔首次公开募股中募集约 10 亿美元资金
item.description: 熟悉内情的人士透露，韩国机械制造商 DN Solutions Co. 将在首尔首次公开募股，募集 8 亿至 10 亿美元，这可能是韩国今年最大的此类交易。【原文：South Korean machinery maker DN Solutions Co. is seeking $800 million to $1 billion in an initial public offering in Seoul, people familiar with the matter said, in what could be the country’s largest such deal this year.】

item.title: 香港考虑降低购买最昂贵股票的门槛
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，香港证券交易所正在讨论降低投资者购买该市一些最昂贵股票的门槛，以刺激交易的方案。【原文：Hong Kong’s stock exchange is discussing options to lower the threshold for investors to buy some of the city’s most expensive stocks to stoke trading, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 消费者情绪低迷影响利润，Samsonite 将推进美国上市计划
item.description: Samsonite International SA 表示，由于消费者情绪弱于预期和全球零售流量放缓，该公司利润下降，但仍在继续朝着可能在美国两地上市的方向取得进展。【原文：Samsonite International SA says it continues to make progress toward a potential dual listing in the US, as profit fell amid weaker-than-expected consumer sentiment and slower retail traffic globally.】

item.title: 安瓦尔否认马来西亚用投资拯救萨普拉能源公司
item.description: 总理安瓦尔-易卜拉欣（Anwar Ibrahim）表示，他已下令对萨普拉能源有限公司（Sapura Energy Bhd.【原文：Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim said he had ordered an audit of Sapura Energy Bhd. and a change of management before approving a controversial 1.1 billion ringgit ($248.2 million) injection into the cash-strapped oil and gas firm.】
